description:
We are Perry Law PLLC in NYC. Our medical malpractice law firm stands up for medical malpractice victims throughout New York City and the 5 NYC burroughs. We handle all types of medical malpractice cases, including those involving:

  • Birth injuries to a baby or the mother
  • Doctor errors
  • Errors during surgery
  • Hospital staff errors
  • Nurse errors
  • Failure to diagnose
  • Medication errors
  • Anesthesia errors

Let our 30+ years of experience help you get the justice you deserve for your pain and suffering. Contact us today for your free initial consultation to learn how we can help you.
